    • Uses of TransactionSigner in com.google.bitcoin.signers

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CustomTransactionSigner
      This signer may be used as a template for creating custom multisig transaction signers.
      class  DummySigSigner
      This transaction signer fills up empty signatures in partial input scripts with a dummy signature.
      class  LocalTransactionSigner
      TransactionSigner implementation for signing inputs using keys from provided KeyBag.
      class  StatelessTransactionSigner
      A signer that doesn't have any state to be serialized.
